marklogic.body:
Catching up again on the recorded show (so that I could fast forward through Nicki Minaj! lol ). What I'm liking best about the results show are Jimmy's comments, which I'm starting to believe aren't made after he knows the vote totals. He was dead on with Colton and I'm Glad that he called him out on his performance. I think that the judges are now starting to pimp Colton, and I am expecting him to make at least the final 3. Jimmy was so right about Hollie and DeAndre too (although wrong about the teen girls voting). My one disagreement would be his enthusiasm for P2, but I think that Jimmy may have been supporting Stevie (and still has a soft Spot for her? lol ).
It was Heejun's time to go, no question about it and I thought that DeAndre deserved to be in the bottom 3 rather than Skylar (and I don't like country). Heejun's antics finally caught up to him and when he was serious, it was pretty clear that his singing was lacking (still very good for someone who allegedly only started singing a few months ago).
